Subject: Renewing server portal certificates for Prod and Dev
Description:
Hi guys,

Our 2 x on-prem servers need their admin portal certificates renewing - expire 23/3/25.

We have new certificates issued by our external CA, how do we apply the certs, do you guys have to SSH into the boxes to renew the certs?

Regards
Peter
What_We_Know__c:
We have provided the steps for updating the server certificate using the UI.
The customer confirmed that the update was successful.
Solution_Comment__c: We have provided the steps for updating the server certificate using the EPP UI.
